#summary Welcome to Game Golem
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Game Golem is an auto-player for Facebook games. Golem is designed to be as human-like as possible in how it plays, and will never do anything that you cannot do yourself (though it may take you more time).


= Browser Support =

[http://www.mozilla.com/ Firefox] with [https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/748/ Greasemonkey] extension installed.

[http://www.google.com/chrome Chrome] (Please note that the Chrome extension is marked as "beta" due to a small number of chrome bugs, Golem is otherwise identical in behaviour on all platforms.)

= Supported Games =

[castle_age Castle Age]

_Please click on games for Golem help about them and their options._
